structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Attorney Fees; Limitations On Contingency Fees

text.section: Forty per cent of the first one hundred and fifty thousand dollars recovered;
Thirty-three and one-third per cent of the next one hundred and fifty thousand dollars recovered;
Thirty per cent of the next two hundred thousand dollars recovered;
Twenty-five per cent of any amount by which the recovery exceeds five hundred thousand dollars.
